alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Jackson County through 600 PM CDT... At 532 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Graceville to 13 miles northwest of Chattahoochee. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Chattahoochee, Malone, Sneads, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Campbellton, Bascom, Blue Spring, Lovedale, Dellwood, Star, Hornsville, Jacobs, Ellaville, Buena Vista, Marianna Municipal A/P, Jacob City and Kynesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
